title: A tourist stay home for sale
details:
21.9 perches land and 4 bedrooms. Two of them attached bathroom.
Approved tourists home stay house for 8 people.
Just walking distance to Galle road at gurubabila,weligama.
250 m to the beach
3.5 km to weligama
700 m to midigama surfing point
7.0 km to Mirissa
10.0 km to weligama southern highway entrance
